name: Bankers Securities Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia School District
name_abbreviation: Bankers Securities Corp. v. Philadelphia School District

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBkide, JJ.
Mr. Justice Bok took no part in the consideration or decision of this ease.
parties: Bankers Securities Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
The order of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge (now Justice) Bok, of the Court of Common Pleas No. 6 of Philadelphia County, reported at 16 Pa. D. & C. 2d 248.
Mr. Justice Bok took no part in the consideration or decision of this ease.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: William A. Kelley, Jr., with him Fols, Bard, Kamsler, Goodis & Greenfield, for appellant.
G. Brewster Rhoads, with him Edward B. Soleen, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Bankers Securities Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia School District.
Argued September 29, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBkide, JJ.
reargument refused December 11, 1959.
William A. Kelley, Jr., with him Fols, Bard, Kamsler, Goodis & Greenfield, for appellant.
G. Brewster Rhoads, with him Edward B. Soleen, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellees.
November 9, 1959:
